column1: #text=Today I am going to ride a train to visit my grandmother .
#text=We are going to visit for my birthday .
#text=We left our home and drove in our car to the train station .
#text=We then went up to the counter and bought two tickets to ride the train to my grandmother 's town .
#text=We had to wait for twenty minutes in the station before it was time to board our train .
#text=When it was time , we went over to the train and handed our tickets to a man in a uniform that works on the train .
#text=He checked our tickets and helped us up onto the train .
#text=We then found a seat and enjoyed the ride .
#text=We saw many interesting things on our way to see my grandmother .
#text=The train moved very fast along the tracks .
#text=When the train pulled into the station , we saw my grandmother waiting there for us !
